mapper.select: select user_id, user_name from users where user_name =#{userName}

mapper.update: update users set user_id=#{userId}, user_pwd=#{userPwd}, user_name=#{userName}, user_address=#{userAddress}, user_post=#{userPost}, user_mail=#{userMail}, user_phone=#{userPhone}, user_ishome=#{userIshome}, user_grade=#{userGrade} where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: select to_char(to_date(order_date,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'dd') as order_date, sum(order_price) as order_price from order_statement group by to_char(to_date(order_date,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'dd') order by order_date desc

select to_char(to_date(order_date,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'mm') as order_date , sum(order_price) as order_price from order_statement group by to_char(to_date(order_date,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'mm') order by order_date desc

select to_char(to_date(order_date,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy') as order_date , sum(order_price) as order_price from order_statement group by to_char(to_date(order_date,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy') order by order_date desc
